wiki.content: Tank! is the opening song for the anime series Cowboy Bebop. It was written by Yoko Kanno and performed by The Seatbelts, has an extensive alto saxophone solo. The song is a big band jazz piece in a hard bop style with a rhythm portion that combines a bass guitar and bongo drums. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Tank! is the opening song for the anime series Cowboy Bebop. It was written by Yoko Kanno and performed by The Seatbelts, has an extensive alto saxophone solo. The song is a big band jazz piece in a hard bop style with a rhythm portion that combines a bass guitar and bongo drums.
